name: Tuberkith
description: The Tuberkith is a small plant creature with distinctive abilities, featuring a sturdy natural armor and a series of eyes that enhance its perception.
memorable: Its ability to knock opponents prone combined with its advantage against movement effects makes it a strategic combatant.
goals: Survive and ambush predators while defending its territory.
relations: May interact with other plant creatures or forest animals, possibly serving as guardians in a forest environment.
environment: Typically found in forested areas or overgrown regions.
strengths: Advantage on saves against displacement and perception checks related to sight.
weaknesses: Low Strength and Charisma make it vulnerable in physical confrontations and social interactions.
attacks: Utilizes Peeler and Masher attacks, capable of dealing slashing and bludgeoning damage with additional effects.
most_powerful_ability: Deep Roots grants it significant resistance to being moved against its will.
senses: Has darkvision up to 60 feet, allowing it to see in darkness as if it were dim light.
skills: Proficient in perception with an average modifier.
additional_information: Can use its Deep Roots ability to resist attempts to move it.
Prevents attacking creatures from benefiting from teamwork tactics when not blinded.
Moves at a speed of 30 feet and can burrow even faster.
Uses its Dozens of Eyes ability for enhanced perception.
Has a low challenge rating, making it suitable for minor encounters.
test_queries: small swift plant creature with burrowing
tough plant creature that can knock foes down
plant monster with many eyes in the forest
creature that ambushes and prevents teamwork
burrowing creature that is hard to displace
